name: IVErtapenem
title: IV Ertapenem
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values includes codes which represent a select antibiotic that is used in an inpatient setting for surgical prophylaxis.  This antibiotic is Ertapenem.  This is not dose specific, however, it must only be given intravenously.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are on prophylactic antibiotics prior to surgery consistent with current guidelines.  Using the Quality Data Model, this element will map to the Medication category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Only use codes which represent the antibiotic Ertapenem given intravenously.  Codes used are to be RxNorm codes only.),(Exclusion Criteria: None.)
